import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { registerData = { username: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' }; onRegister() { console.log(this.registerData); } }
